includedAssets.title: Fun Run
includedAssets.synopsis: Michael organises a fun run for Meredith after he hits her with his car, while Dwight takes care of Angela's cat, but not in the way she expected.

includedAssets.title: Money
includedAssets.synopsis: Pam and Jim travel to Dwight's family farm, now a bed and breakfast, for a romantic evening. Meanwhile, Michael worries about his spiralling debts.
